Posts.Content: I am Invasive Ductal Carcinoma, Her 2+, Stage IIIA diagnosed in 2012. I received neo-adjuvant chemotherapy, then mastectomy left breast, BRCA Neg, 25 sessions of radiation. Completed all treatment by May of 2013. May of this year I am going in for reconstruction of left breast. I had my last appointment with oncologist and surgeon in the spring of this year.
Posts.Title: Looking for HER 2 + -ER-PR stage 3a Long Term Success Stories--Any out there??

Posts.Content: I utilized it two to three days prior to the chemo.......take it twice a day for a couple of days prior to your treatment. It lessened the blow each time for me. The very first time with neulasta had me in another world of pain and all of the above side effects. The next three I did Claritin. Although it was bad I was functioning on a higher level than without the Claritin. Joint pain was unavoidable.
Posts.Title: Claritan before chemo and/or Neulasta or other recommendations
